explains: n. 劈开，分裂；[晶体] 解理；[胚] 卵裂
wordGroup: cleavage fracture [物]解理断裂；可裂性破坏

sentences.en: The energy for the reaction is gained by the cleavage of Uridine diphosphate (UDP).
sentences.cn: 反应的能量通过二磷酸尿苷的裂解获得。

sentences.en: Actin cleavage by caspase-3 may accelerate proteosome dependent muscle proteolysis.
sentences.cn: 通过 caspase-3 剪切的 Actin 可能加速蛋白酶体依赖的肌肉蛋白水解。

sentences.en: Are those your eyeballs? I found them in my cleavage.
sentences.cn: 是你的眼球吗？我发现它们夹在镊子里面了。
